#summary Provides an Action for inverting the Storage.ReadXXX instructions mused within a DXCore plugins Options Screen. Yields some Storage.WriteXXX statements instead.
[http://www.rorybecker.co.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_OptionsInverter/ http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Download.png]      [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/InstallInstructions  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/InstallHelp.png]
[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/Feedback  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Feedback.png]
===== Requires DXCore 11.1 =====
=== Introduction ===
Helps a plugin writer by providing a facility to change a *Storage.ReadXXX* assignment into a *Storage.WriteXXX* statement.

=== Configuration ===
Simply [http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/rorybecker/archive/2010/10/05/binding-keys-in-coderush.aspx Add a shortcut] binding a key combo of your choice to the new *!ReadWriteInverter* command.

=== Usage ===
Simply ...
 * Copy the assignment statements from your *!PreparePage* event into your *!CommitChanges* event.
 * Highlight the copied code.
 * Activate the new *!ReadWriteInverter* command.

Watch with wonder as your *Storage.ReadXXX* assignments are converted into *Storage.WriteXXX* statements.
